verses.verse: And the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H7126>came<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders,<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the fathers' [households] of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>

and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> as an <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and my <S%H113>lord<s%> was <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

"But if they <S%H1961>marry<s%> <S%H802><s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of the [other] <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> will be <S%H1639>withdrawn<s%> from the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of our fathers and will be <S%H1>added<s%> to the <S%H3254>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H5159>tribe<s%> to <S%H4294>which<s%> they <S%H834>belong;<s%> thus it will be <S%H1961>withdrawn<s%> from our <S%H1639>allotted<s%> <S%H1486>inheritance.<s%>

"And <S%H518>when<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1961>comes,<s%> then their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> will be <S%H3254>added<s%> to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> to <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H1961>belong;<s%> so their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> will be <S%H1639>withdrawn<s%> from the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of our fathers."

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "The <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> are <S%H9210>right<s%> in [their] <S%H1696>statements.<s%>

<S%H2088>"This<s%> is <S%H1697>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> concerning the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'Let them <S%H1961>marry<s%> <S%H802><s%> whom they <S%H2896>wish<s%><S%H5869>;<s%> <S%H389>only<s%> they must <S%H1961>marry<s%> <S%H802><s%> within the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their father.'

"Thus <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H5437>transferred<s%> from <S%H4294>tribe<s%> to <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H1692>hold<s%> to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of his fathers.

"And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> who <S%H3423>comes<s%> into <S%H3423>possession<s%> of an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall be <S%H802>wife<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of her father, <S%H1>so<s%> that the <S%H4616>sons<s%> of <S%H1121>Israel<s%> <S%H3478>each<s%> may <S%H376>possess<s%> the <S%H3423>inheritance<s%> of his fathers.

"Thus <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> shall be <S%H5437>transferred<s%> from one <S%H4294>tribe<s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4294>tribe,<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H1692>hold<s%> to his own <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>"
<S%H9201>Just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> did: <S%H6213><s%>

They <S%H802>married<s%> [those] from the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H1961>remained<s%> with the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of their father.

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> by the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> [opposite] <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>
